definition: to look for bones in an egg/to find fault/to nitpick (idiom)
pinyin: ji1 dan4 li5 tiao1 gu3 tou5

definition: lit. an egg colliding with a rock (idiom)/fig. to attack sb stronger than oneself/to overrate one's abilities

sentences.english: Bacteria can be inside an uncracked, whole egg.
sentences.chinese: 細菌也存在於無縫完整的雞蛋內部。

sentences.english: I drink milk and have an egg, sometimes I will have meat porridge.
sentences.chinese: 我喝牛奶和喫一個雞蛋，有時候喝肉粥。

sentences.english: Put the flour in the bowl and then beat the eggs in.
sentences.chinese: 進一些麪粉，然後打幾隻雞蛋攪拌進去。

sentences.english: Eggs that are scrambled and eaten with toast are typically unfertilized.
sentences.chinese: 我們喫的炒雞蛋一般來說是未受精的雞蛋。

sentences.english: Eggs that are scrambled and eaten with toast are typically unfertilized.
sentences.chinese: 我們喫的炒雞蛋一般來說是未受精的雞蛋。

sentences.english: "Don't put all your eggs in one basket." is all wrong.
sentences.chinese: “別把所有的雞蛋放進一個籃子”之說大錯特錯。

sentences.english: Low-Glycemic-index vegetables are allowed as well as low-fat cheese, nuts, eggs.
sentences.chinese: 低血糖指數的蔬菜被允許以及低脂奶酪，堅果，雞蛋。

sentences.english: He is so stupid that he can't boil an egg.
sentences.chinese: 他太笨了，連雞蛋都不會煮。

sentences.english: Near the top of the nutrient-dense food list are whole eggs.
sentences.chinese: 在營養素密集食品排行榜上雞蛋名列前茅。

sentences.english: The eggs are packed in cartons with beehives lined with shake-proof paper board.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋要用帶蜂房孔，外襯防震紙板的紙箱包裝。

sentences.english: People like, to cook tomatoes with eggs.
sentences.chinese: 人們喜歡用雞蛋炒西紅柿。

sentences.english: Wal-Mart’s and Costco’s private labels only use cage-free eggs.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾瑪和科斯克的自有品牌都只使用散養雞蛋。

sentences.english: Eggs are graded from small to extra - large.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋從小的到特大的分成了等級。

sentences.english: Blend egg with 2 tbsp of mungbean flour. Add in chicken and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋加生粉2湯匙拌勻成濃糊狀，加入雞塊攔勻。

definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
